scripts.firefox: which firefox; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then firefox http://localhost:8080/; else echo 'Error! Firefox not found'; fi
scripts.transpile: export BABEL_ENV=build; mkdir -p build && node_modules/babel/bin/babel.js src/ -d build
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run transpile && npm run pack
scripts.build2: export BABEL_ENV=build; npm run clear && mkdir -p dist && node buildAndConcat.js
